DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate impact brief clinic-based educational intervention utilization Double Up Food Bucks ( DUFB ) â€”a Michigan-wide Supplemental Nutrition Assistance Program ( SNAP ) healthy food incentive -- among low income health center patient community health center Southeast Michigan .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluating Use Farmers Market Incentive Program Among Low-Income Health Center Patients
DOC.detailed_description: Study participant provide 3-5 minute explanation DUFB , write program material , initial $ 10 market voucher . Participants survey four time five month , subset also participate post-intervention focus group .
